name: AOK
tag_list: social-game-for-good, social-game, good-deeds, game-for-good, social-good, social-business
overview:
AOK is a ‘social game for good’ and online community that makes sharing positive actions playful, rewarding and impactful.

The AOK game experience rewards players for posting and sharing positive “Acts” and “Observations” (aka AOKs) with Cause Currency points donated to real world causes and organizations that further social good.

Brands get in the game by activating their campaigns and fan base with AOK’s product suite (FB/Mobile Apps, Gameboard and Activity Feed) and custom rewards program.

Organizations increase market visibility for all of the positive action they contribute to the world…while making it more fun for those doing the positive action!

AOK’s use of *flashtags (a meta-tag within AOK) allows players to connect their positive action and create on-the-fly challenges and reward structures to drive positive change.

It’s a new kind of kind.
